content.html: Will not be surprised in the least when these things are given more rights than citizens. Being killed accidentally by one "on duty" will not net the owners any punishment b/c "it's automated", but destroying/disabling one will be THE BIGGEST federal crime they can throw at you.
content.value:
Will not be surprised in the least when these things are given more rights than citizens.

Being killed accidentally by one "on duty" will not net the owners any punishment b/c "it's automated", but destroying/disabling one will be THE BIGGEST federal crime they can throw at you.
